00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value
00028 #error_reporting( E_ALL | E_STRICT );

00030 /**
00031  * Class manager
00032  * 
00033  * This class will handle every request to a class from this project,
00034  * by automatically loading the class file (thanx to the SPL).
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 final class tx_oop_Core_ClassManager
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * The unique instance of the class (singleton)
00045      */
00046     private static $_instance = NULL;
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * The loaded classes from this project
00050      */
00051     private $_loadedClasses   = array();
00052     
00053     /**
00054      * The available top packages
00055      */
00056     private $_packages        = array();
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * The directory which contains the classes
00060      */
00061     private $_classDir        = '';
00062     
00063     /**
00064      * Class constructor
00065      * 
00066      * The class constructor is private to avoid multiple instances of the
00067      * class (singleton).
00068      * 
00069      * @return NULL
00070      */
00071     private function __construct()
00072     {
00073         // Stores the directory containing the classes
00074         $this->_classDir = realpath( dirname( __FILE__ ) . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . '..' )
00075                          . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
00076         
00077         // Creates a directory iterator in the directory containing this file
00078         $dirIterator     = new DirectoryIterator( $this->_classDir );
00079         
00080         // Adds this class to the loaded classes array
00081         $this->_loadedClasses[ __CLASS__ ] = __FILE__;
00082         
00083         // Process each directory
00084         foreach( $dirIterator as $file ) {
00085             
00086             // Checks if the file is a PHP class file
00087             if( substr( $file, strlen( $file ) - 10 ) === '.class.php' ) {
00088                 
00089                 // Stores the file name, with it's full path
00090                 $this->_packages[ ( string )$file ] = $file->getPathName();
00091                 
00092                 // Process the next file
00093                 continue;
00094             }
00095             
00096             // Checks if the file is a directory
00097             if( !$file->isDir() ) {
00098                 
00099                 // File - Process the next file
00100                 continue;
00101             }
00102             
00103             // Checks if the directory is hidden
00104             if( substr( $file, 0, 1 ) === '.' ) {
00105                 
00106                 // Hidden - Process the next file
00107                 continue;
00108             }
00109             
00110             // Stores the directory name, with it's full path
00111             $this->_packages[ ( string )$file ] = $file->getPathName();
00112         }
00113     }
00114     
00115     /**
00116      * Clones an instance of the class
00117      * 
00118      * A call to this method will produce an exception, as the class cannot
00119      * be cloned (singleton).
00120      * 
00121      * @return  NULL
00122      * @throws  tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception Always, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton)
00123      */
00124     public function __clone()
00125     {
00126         throw new tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception(
00127             'Class ' . __CLASS__ . ' cannot be cloned',
00128             tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception::EXCEPTION_CLONE
00129         );
00130     }
00131     
00132     /**
00133      * Gets the unique class instance
00134      * 
00135      * This method is used to get the unique instance of the class
00136      * (singleton). If no instance is available, it will create it.
00137      * 
00138      * @return  tx_oop_Core_ClassManager    The unique instance of the class
00139      */
00140     public static function getInstance()
00141     {
00142         // Checks if the unique instance already exists
00143         if( !is_object( self::$_instance ) ) {
00144             
00145             // Creates the unique instance
00146             self::$_instance = new self();
00147         }
00148         
00149         // Returns the unique instance
00150         return self::$_instance;
00151     }
00152     
00153     /**
00154      * SPL autoload method
00155      * 
00156      * When registered with the spl_autoload_register() function, this method
00157      * will be called each time a class cannot be found, and will try to
00158      * load it.
00159      * 
00160      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00161      * @return  boolean
00162      * @see     getInstance
00163      * @see     _loadClass
00164      */
00165     public static function autoLoad( $className )
00166     {
00167         // Instance of this class
00168         static $instance = NULL;
00169         
00170         // Checks if the instance of the class has already been fetched
00171         if( !is_object( $instance ) ) {
00172             
00173             // Gets the instance of this class
00174             $instance = self::getInstance();
00175         }
00176         
00177         // Checks if the class belongs to the 'tx_oop' package
00178         if( substr( $className, 0, 7 ) === 'tx_oop_' ) {
00179             
00180             // Gets the class root package
00181             $rootPkg = substr( $className, 7, strpos( $className, '_', 7 ) - 7 );
00182             
00183             // Checks if the requested class belongs to this project
00184             if( isset( $instance->_packages[ $rootPkg ] )
00185                 || isset( $instance->_packages[ $className . '.class.php' ] )
00186             ) {
00187                 
00188                 // Loads the class
00189                 return $instance->_loadClass( $className );
00190                 
00191             }
00192         }
00193         
00194         // The requested class does not belong to this project
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197     
00198     /**
00199      * Loads a class from this project
00200      * 
00201      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00202      * @return  boolean
00203      */
00204     private function _loadClass( $className )
00205     {
00206         // Gets the class path
00207         $classPath = $this->_classDir
00208                    . str_replace( '_', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, substr( $className, 7 ) )
00209                    . '.class.php';
00210         
00211         // Checks if the class file exists
00212         if( file_exists( $classPath ) ) {
00213             
00214             // Includes the class file
00215             require_once( $classPath );
00216             
00217             // Checks if the requested class is an interface
00218             if( substr( $className, -9 ) === 'Interface' ) {
00219                 
00220                 // Checks if the interface is defined
00221                 if( !interface_exists( $className ) ) {
00222                     
00223                     // Error message
00224                     $errorMsg = 'The interface '
00225                               . $className
00226                               . ' is not defined in file '
00227                               . $classPath;
00228                     
00229                     // The class is not defined
00230                     trigger_error( $errorMsg, E_USER_ERROR );
00231                 }
00232                 
00233             } elseif( !class_exists( $className ) ) {
00234                 
00235                 // Error message
00236                 $errorMsg = 'The class '
00237                           . $className
00238                           . ' is not defined in file '
00239                           . $classPath;
00240                 
00241                 // The class is not defined
00242                 trigger_error( $errorMsg, E_USER_ERROR );
00243             }
00244             
00245             // Adds the class to the loaded classes array
00246             $this->_loadedClasses[ $className ] = $classPath;
00247             
00248             // Class was successfully loaded
00249             return true;
00250         }
00251         
00252         // Class file was not found
00253         return false;
00254     }
00255     
00256     /**
00257      * Gets the loaded classes from this project
00258      * 
00259      * @return  array   An array with the loaded classes
00260      */
00261     public function getLoadedClasses()
00262     {
00263         // Returns the loaded classes from this project
00264         return $this->_loadedClasses;
00265     }
00266 }
